text: Tomadera yadi kona mangala haya; tahale tadera kharapa lage. Ara tomadera yadi amangala haya tahale anandita haya ara tate yadi tomara dhairyyadharana kara ebam taka'oya abalambana kara, tabe tadera prataranaya tomadera kona'i ksati habe na. Niscaya'i tara ya kichu kare se samasta'i allahara ayatte rayeche.
